title: Oaths and affirmations
dataVerified: Affiant name, oath text, notary name, notary commission number, oath administration date, notary seal, purpose of oath
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents forged oaths for government applications and court proceedings. Domain binding verifies notary commission. Court testimony requires authenticated oaths. Government applications (security clearances) require sworn statements. Security clearance affidavits must be verifiably notarized. Witness oaths in legal proceedings. Prevents fraud in sworn government documents.
